content.subject: Fwd: Issue #409: Animating DOM Changes, Atomic CSS-in-JS, Selection in CSS
content.body:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: CSS Weekly <newsletter@css-weekly.com>
Date: Tue, May 5, 2020 at 11:28 PM
Subject: Issue #409: Animating DOM Changes, Atomic CSS-in-JS, Selection in
CSS
To: <thesilentimp@gmail.com>







[image: CSS Weekly]
Issue #409 â¢ May 5, 2020
view online version
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=740670acff&e=63b2a789f5>





Animating DOM Changes
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=d6ec978f9a&e=63b2a789f5>


[image: animating-dom-changes.jpg]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=4b76b26057&e=63b2a789f5>

Ada Rose Cannon shares some tips on smoothly adding, removing, resizing,
and reordering elements.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=ced6883e96&e=63b2a789f5>

Atomic CSS-in-JS
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=07389e2710&e=63b2a789f5>


[image: atomic-css-in-js.jpg]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=f1123ca4e7&e=63b2a789f5>

SÃ©bastien Lorber explains what atomic CSS is and how it relates to
functional / utility-first CSS like Tailwind CSS.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=1a30b7b17d&e=63b2a789f5>



From Our Sponsor
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=f8a57408c8&e=63b2a789f5>





Don't wait, start your journey toward a software engineering career today!
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=bc42987ae9&e=63b2a789f5>


[image: springboard-software-engineering-career1.jpg]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=348da236fe&e=63b2a789f5>

Learn key software engineering skills like HTML/CSS and JavaScript in as
little as 4 weeks. Springboard is an outcomes-driven online school offering
mentor-guided courses that allow people a path toward in-demand careers in
tech like software engineering, data science, UI/UX design and more. [image:
1320.gif?opens=1]

Learn more and get started
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=be0344e5a0&e=63b2a789f5>



Articles & Tutorials





Selection in CSS
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=37ec250d4d&e=63b2a789f5>

Ahmad Shadeed goes through everything about the text selection in CSS,
which includes the pseudo-classes *::selection* and *user-select*.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=0d845a275a&e=63b2a789f5>

The CSS âcontentâ Property Accepts Alternative Text
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=aa6ef9691d&e=63b2a789f5>

Stefan Judis explains how the *content* property supports a way to define
alternative text for generated content.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=7e4864a4f3&e=63b2a789f5>

Adding CSS to a Page via HTTP Headers
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=f1a27e365c&e=63b2a789f5>

Louis Lazaris explores if itâs possible to add CSS to pages by means of
HTTP headers.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=7e0ad0fd31&e=63b2a789f5>

Implementing Dark Mode In React Apps Using styled-components
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=0a696fdd89&e=63b2a789f5>

Blessing Krofegha shows how to efficiently implement dark mode in a React
app on a simple web page, using the *styled-components* library and
leveraging some React features like hooks.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=09a4851661&e=63b2a789f5>

How to Create Pure CSS Games
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=ba14a5317d&e=63b2a789f5>

Elad Shechter will teach you how to create pure CSS games.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=dc10ed620c&e=63b2a789f5>



Promoted Link
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=276fce8d63&e=63b2a789f5>





 [image: photile.jpg]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=d6f87cc1bd&e=63b2a789f5>
Photile.co
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=92951ec63d&e=63b2a789f5>

Photile for Instagram is a web-based app that helps you create photo
collages from your Instagram photos quickly and easily.

Create Now
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=c9336786fa&e=63b2a789f5>



Tools





Generic Components
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=d93a45b3fe&e=63b2a789f5>

A collection of generic web components with a focus on accessibility, ease
of use, and style.

Check it out
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=dc93eefb4c&e=63b2a789f5>

700+ CSS Icons
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=acf22083a3&e=63b2a789f5>

Open-source CSS, SVG, and Figma UI icons, available in SVG Sprite,
styled-components, NPM & API.

Check it out
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=2c42545a61&e=63b2a789f5>



Inspiration





CSS Parish
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=4075b4ded4&e=63b2a789f5>


[image: css-parish.jpg]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=aa20713646&e=63b2a789f5>

Luciano Felix created a beautiful illustration using only CSS.

Get inspired
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=c0c593e23b&e=63b2a789f5>



Until Next Week





Thanks for reading! If you find the content valuable, please consider
supporting
the newsletter on Patreon
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=1c90ab5e49&e=63b2a789f5>
.

Happy coding,
Zoran Jambor
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=a51a2a6b12&e=63b2a789f5>
